sentence.Network_en: A pH test measures the acidity or alkalinity of a substance.
sentence.Network_cn: pH值测试可检测物质的酸碱度。

sentence.Network_en: Add honey to counterbalance the acidity.
This plant prefers alkaline soil, though it will readily tolerate some acidity.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种植物在酸性土壤中也能生存, 但硷性土壤更加适宜.

酸味(Acidity) 这里所指的酸味，系把葡萄经过发酵所产生的一种酒石酸(Tartaric)。这对葡萄酒的陈年老化有很大的影响。

entry.def: An acid is a chemical substance, usually a liquid, which contains hydrogen and can react with other substances to form salts. Some acids burn or dissolve other substances that they come into contact with.

example.ex: Acids in the stomach destroy the virus.
These shrubs must have an acid, lime-free soil.
example.tran: 这些灌木必须生长在不含石灰的酸性土壤环境。

entry.def: An acid fruit or drink has a sour or sharp taste.

example.ex: These wines may taste rather hard and somewhat acid.
example.tran: 这些酒可能喝着比较冲并且有股酸味。

entry.def: An acid remark, or acid humour, is very unkind or critical.

example.ex: This comedy of contemporary manners is told with compassion and acid humour.
example.tran: 这部当代风尚喜剧杂糅了悲悯的情怀和尖酸的幽默。

entry.def: The drug LSD is sometimes referred to as acid .

means.word_mean: 2. the taste experience when something acidic is taken into the mouth

stems_affixes.word_buile: acid尖,酸,锐利+ulous有……的→有酸味的

sentences.en: Check the acidity of the soil with a test kit.
sentences.cn: 用试验器具测一下土壤的酸度。

sentences.en: This plant prefers alkaline soil, though it will readily tolerate some acidity.
sentences.cn: 这种植物在酸性土壤中也能生存，但硷性土壤更加适宜。

sentences.en: Acidity in soil can be neutralized by spreading lime on it.
sentences.cn: 土壤的酸性可以通过在它上面撒石灰来中和。
